originalTitle: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
title: Nigerian officers to face trial over coup-plot allegations
content: Following an investigation some of the 16 detained last year are accused of planning to unseat President Bola Tinubu.

originalTitle: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
title: South Sudan army threat to 'spare no-one' condemned
content: The UN mission says it is gravely concerned by "inflammatory rhetoric calling for violence against civilians".

originalTitle: Kipyegon announces plans for maternity ward in hometown
title: Kipyegon announces plans for maternity ward in hometown
content: Kenyan middle-distance runner Faith Kipyegon plans to build a  maternity facility in her hometown Keringet in partnership with her shoe sponsor.

originalTitle: Spain to host 2030 World Cup final, its football federation president says
title: Spain to host 2030 World Cup final, its football federation president says
content: Spain, Portugal, Morocco are tournament cohosts, but FIFA, which has the final say, has not said who will get last game.

title: Somali’s in Minnesota
content: Maryam Mohamad is a Somali American who lives in Minnesota.

originalTitle: Gaza’s unequal dead: 10,000 Palestinians under rubble, one Israeli captive
title: Gaza’s unequal dead: 10,000 Palestinians under rubble, one Israeli captive
content: Israel razes 200 graves for body of final captive while thousands of Palestinians killed are lost and unidentified.

originalTitle: India and EU announce 'mother of all trade deals'
title: India and EU announce 'mother of all trade deals'
content: The long-awaited deal comes as both Delhi and Brussels contend with economic and geopolitical pressure from the US.

originalTitle: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
title: Immigration chief at centre of Trump's crackdown set to leave Minneapolis
content: The US president is sending border tsar Tom Homan to the city in an apparent shift in tone from the White House.

originalTitle: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
title: Deadly US winter storm leaves flights delayed and thousands without power
content: At least a dozen people have died in multiple US states possibly due to the storm, officials have said.

originalTitle: Man Utd's Dorgu set for weeks out with hamstring issue
title: Man Utd's Dorgu set for weeks out with hamstring issue
content: In-form Patrick Dorgu is still being assessed but he is likely to miss Manchester United matches with the injury he picked up against Arsenal.

originalTitle: How 'Premier League' Galatasaray can derail Man City
title: How 'Premier League' Galatasaray can derail Man City
content: Needing a positive result to keep their Champions League campaign on track, Galatasaray are not the side Manchester City would choose to face in their final game of the league phase.

originalTitle: Luiz agrees Villa return on loan
title: Luiz agrees Villa return on loan
content: Aston Villa agree a deal to re-sign former midfielder Douglas Luiz on loan as Unai Emery looks to bolster his options in the centre of the pitch.
